lyrics:
5 contributorsopus 17 don’t you worry ’bout me lyricsverse 1
oh i can see
there aint no room for me
youre only holding out
your heart in sympathy
if theres another man
then girl i understand
go on and take his hand
and dont you worry bout me

verse 2
ill be blue baby blue
and ill be crying too
crying too crying too
but girl you know i only want
whats best for you
what good is all my pride
if our true love has died
go on and be his bride
and dont you worry bout me

verse 3
ill be strong
ill try to carry on
although you know it wont be easy
when youre gone
ill always think of you
the tender love we knew
but somehow ill get through
so dont you worry bout me
ooh baby
see the four seasons liveget tickets as low as 50you might also likeinterlude
baby blue
crying too crying too
baby worry bout me

verse 4
sweetie pie
before you say goodbye
remember if he ever
leaves you high and dry
dont cry alone in pain
dont ever feel ashamed
if you want me again
just dont you worry bout me

verse 5
i love you loving you
no matter what you do
loving you loving you
ill spend my whole life waiting
if you want me to
and if this is goodbye
you know id rather die
than let you see me cry
cause then youd worry bout me
verse 6
ill be strong
ill try to carry on
although you know it wont be easy
when youre gone
ill always think of you
the tender love we knew
but somehow ill get through
so dont you worry bout me

verse 7
ill be strong
ill try to carry on
although you know it wont be easy
when youre gone
ill always think of you
the tender love we knew
but somehow ill get through
so dont you worry bout me

outro
oh i’ll be strong i’ll be strong
i’ll try to carry on
although you know it won’t be easy
when you’re goneembed
